input.sentences: the family went to the fair . the mom was n't too sure about the ride but the daughter was excited .
once the ride started both the mom and daughter had fun .
after the rides they wanted something to eat . there were so many choices it was hard to choose .
the girl got cotton candy | a traditional treat at the fair .
then the family got their food and sat down to eat . the little girl sat by her dad and seemed to thoroughly enjoy her corn on the cob .
output.sentences: The family went to the fair and mom and daughter got on a ride.
When the ride started mom got a little scared.
Since the ride was a bit hard on mom she talked her daughter into getting something to eat.
They got the traditional fair treat and the girl enjoyed it almost as much as the rides.
Dad sat with his girl while she enjoyed more fair food.
